title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Friend and mentor of the show, Bo Snerdley, pushes back against the left. Liberals wish to break up the country by teaching the younger generation to be ashamed of being an American. WSJ Poll: Is pride in America a thing of the past? The democrat party is an identity politics brand. When liberals control all the levers of power, who are the youth rebelling against? Less time on social media equals more happiness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
